name: Stolen Shine | Destiny 2 Fangame
description:
Hollie Garrick, a void-using Titan, strays off from her Fireteam in Savathûn's Throne World - and meets a strange Hive Lightbearer who... doesn't want to kill her on sight? 

  • 5k words
  • 3 Endings
  • Short and sweet story

Minimum Requirements (sorry Mac users!):

Windows

  • Version: Windows Vista or higher.
  • CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • RAM: 2.0 GB
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c

Linux

  • Version: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • RAM: 2.0 GB
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0

Destiny 2 and it's universe belongs to Bungie, this is a fan-project and is not related to Bungie at all - it's probably not even very lore accurate. 

Made for Nanoreno 2022
